newsitem.title: UKRAINE: SOCCER-UKRAINE HOLD GERMANY TO GOALLESS DRAW.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-UKRAINE HOLD GERMANY TO GOALLESS DRAW.

text.p: Group leaders Ukraine held European champions Germany to a scoreless draw in their World Cup European group nine qualifier in Kiev on Saturday.
Dynamo Kiev striker Serhiy Rebrov had the best chance for the home team but his powerful shot from about 16 metres out hit the post just before halftime.

A Juergen Klinsmann header in the first half, which went wide, and a Thomas Helmer long range effort which Oleksander Shovkovsky saved in the second accounted for Germany's main offensive opportunities.
Ukraine still lead the group with 14 points after eight games, two points clear of Germany who have two games in hand.
Portugal, also with two games in hand, have nine points.
